targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  / 1073741824 FROM "snmp_rx" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Gi0_0_1' AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  / 1073741824 FROM "snmp_tx" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Gi0_0_1' AND $timeFilter
